programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Iceland: Land of Fire and Ice
programme.desc: Iceland is a land born out of fire, sculpted by ice. This unique island is home to some of the planet's rarest and most spectacular creatures and it harbors some of the most extreme environments on Earth.

programme.title: Wildest India: India's Lost World
programme.desc: North-east India is an anthropological paradise; there is no other place on Earth with so many different ethnic groups. The forest are filled with mysterious tribes whose lives are dictated by the rain and the seasonal fruits of the forest.

programme.title: Wildest India: Ganges: River of Life
programme.desc: Then watch, the longest river in India, The Ganges. It's a lifeline to wild animals, from rhinoceros and river dolphins to otters and gharials.

programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits
programme.desc: The Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India. he Himalayas' rugged highlands offer little direct refuge to humans, in the shadow below, over a billion people in India rely on the mountains for survival.

programme.title: Wildest India: Western Ghats: Monsoon Mountains
programme.desc: See how the Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India.The Himalayas' highlands offer little direct refuge to humans. /Then, learn about the western Ghats. A spine of mountains that lay claim to being one of the most bio-diverse places in the world.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Soul Solutions
programme.desc: Determined to defeat Dragan and his Nordic God, Jack summons a mighty new monster to the field that has enough fire power to send all of Dragan's life points up in smoke!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: When Nordic Gods Attack
programme.desc: With only a handful of life points remaining and the Nordic God, Thor, staring down at him, Jack gets set to take on his next opponent - Team Ragnarok's Broder!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Tricking the Trickster
programme.desc: After swooping in take on Team Ragnarok's Broder, Crow finds himself battling two Nordic Gods  Thor and Loki! Can Crow defeat these two dynamos, or will this dynamic duo prove to be too much for Crow and his battle-tested Blackwings?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Yusei's Last Stand
programme.desc: With the tournament on the line, Yusei must find a way to defeat Halldor before the three Nordic Gods knock his life points down to nothing!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Fight to the Finish Line
programme.desc: It's the exciting conclusion to the semifinal battle between Team Ragnarok and Team 5D's! Can Yusei Fudo muster a miracle comeback against Team Ragnarok's Halldor?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Beginning of the End

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dawn of the Machines
programme.desc: It's one down and two to go for Team 5D's as Jack and his mighty Red Nova Dragon get set to take on and take out Primo and Jakob of Team New World!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Against All Odds

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: For Synchro's Sake
programme.desc: With the safety of New Domino City hanging in the balance, Yusei Fudo from Team 5D's looks to rev it up against Team New World's Jakob in the final round of the World Racing Grand Prix!

programme.desc: The crew stand-off with a Russian warship over Syria, and young sailor Danny tries for his first promotion, but chef Liam gets in trouble for drinking and might lose shore leave.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 8
programme.desc: Meet Group 2, sisters Kelsey and Amanda, seafood lovers Josh and Amy, brothers Albert and Dave, ambitious Alyse and Matt, foodie friends Della and Tully and married hipsters Court and Duncan.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 9
programme.desc: You’re invited to Sydney where sisters, Kelsey and Amanda, are like kids in a candy store bringing sweet things to the competition. Plus, the most controversial comment of the season to date.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 10
programme.desc: You’re invited to the instant restaurant of married Melbourne hipsters Court & Duncan, where the food is smokin’ and the table talk is too hot to handle!

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 11
programme.desc: You’re invited to the instant restaurant of Broome seafood lovers Josh and Amy. They believe they’ve got the skills to chart a course for success but it’s not all smooth sailing.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 12
programme.desc: You’re invited to the hobo boho instant restaurant of Brisbane foodie friends, Della and Tully, who are favourites to serve up success. But some aren’t out to taste love as desperation sets in.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Three hairs microscopic fibers a common trash bag ripped from a roll. Seemingly small and insignificant clues become a victim's silent witness.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Coroner Investigator
programme.desc: CI: Coroner Investigator will reveal the most in-depth look to date into the science of death.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Murder For Hire
programme.desc: For some killers, murder can be a profitable business. And the scene of the crime can be both a source for clues, and puzzling questions. When a victim has been targeted for death, investigators must look beyond the obvious to uncover a murder for hire.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Military Justice
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Collective Justice
programme.desc: Philadelphia's Vidocq Society, named after an 18th Century French detective, is one of the world's most unusual crime-solving organizations.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Martin Yan judges six Chinese dishes created by the remaining contestants; during dinner service, one team disappoints a VIP guest; a contestant is eliminated.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants enter an animal pen to determine which type of protein they will cook in the team challenge; during dinner service, the contestants must impress chef Ramsay's family.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must create five steak dishes; a diner finds an unpleasant surprise in her dish during dinner service; the elimination round brings out bad tempers.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of wannabe chefs through a series of gruelling challenges as they battle for the ultimate prize of a head chef position at his Las Vegas restaurant. The two teams are challenged to throw a party fit for a princess.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs compete to participate in a photo shoot and host a dinner for members of the Army.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a mini-kit van into a crazy utility vehicle.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on one of his biggest challenges yet as he tries to turn a Wild Cartoon drawing into a real life Hot Rod. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the challenge as he tries to turn a Wild Cartoon drawing into a real life Hot Rod. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on two Ford Falcon projects. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the transformation of the two Ford Falcons. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a classic 1958 Harley Davidson and a 1984 Kawasaki police cruiser.

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear Burns Down to Ashes
programme.desc: Dylan is tricked by Rev and kidnapped. The crew finds an unexpected ally in a Collector.

programme.title: Andromeda: Lost in a Space That Isn't There
programme.desc: The Abyss has infected Beka. The crew must find a way to save her.

programme.title: Andromeda: Abridging the Devil's Divide
programme.desc: After some of the crew is captured, Harper is forced to work on a time bridge for the Patriarch.

programme.title: Andromeda: Trusting the Gordian Maze
programme.desc: A spy from Tri Gemma shows up on the Andromeda in an attempt to steal the star map.

programme.title: Andromeda: A Symmetry of Imperfection
programme.desc: When Rommie becomes too emotional, the ship cuts her access in order to run diagnostics.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Abyss kills Beka's friend, and the crew must figure out what information they killed for.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Girl in The Ditch
programme.desc: When 12 year old Agnes Ali'iva'a drowned in a ditch in 1992, the police initially thought her death was accidental. It was four years before public and political pressure forced police to re-investigate her death.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Without Warning
programme.desc: This week’s episode of Sensing Murder promises greater co-operation between psychics and police, attempting to uncover the truth about the death of 18-year-old apprentice plumber Regan O’Donoghue, who was killed in a hit and run in 2007.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Ivan Milat: The Backpacker Murders
programme.desc: The backpacker murder case in the Belanglo State Forest, south west of Sydney, has entered Australian criminal folklore.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Anita Cobby Murder
programme.desc: In February 1986, nurse Anita Cobby, a former entrant in the Miss Australia quest, is walking home from Blacktown station in Sydney's outer-western suburbs. A Holden sedan pulls up and Anita is dragged into the vehicle.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Real McLeod
programme.desc: When evidence mounts against Stevie, Kate starts to believe that she could be guilty of Harry Ryan’s murder. Riley reacts badly when a local trainer is revealed to be abusing his horses.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Calling
programme.desc: After a series of confusing dreams and visions, Tess learns that Nick is alive. Kate discovers she may have skin cancer - and hides it from her friends. Moira questions her psychic ability, frustrated by its fickleness.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A STORY: Nick returns, troubled by flashbacks of his mugging in Argentina. B STORY: Kate heads to Adelaide to see the cancer specialist. Jodi follows her, supporting Kate through the terror of discovering she has cancer.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Where the Heart is
programme.desc: A STORY: Nick's unhappiness leads to Tess deciding to return to Argentina with him - after receiving a 'sign' that Drovers Run supports her leaving. B STORY: A brumby stallion lures Phoenix back the wild.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: A STORY: Jodi and Rob flee the hitman. Wounded, Rob leaves the district to give evidence at trial.B STORY: Patrick arrives with a truckload of Boer goats, wanting his brother Dave's help.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Princess and the EVP
programme.desc: The final day has arrived –it's Grant's last investigation with TAPS. And where better to close out his phenomenal run but at Jason and Grant's very own haunted property, Spalding Inn, located in Whitefield, New Hampshire.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Oldest House In Georgia
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS starts out at the Ulster County Jail in Kingston, NY, where inmates and personal have both witnessed activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: French Quarter Phantoms
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to America's most haunted city, New Orleans, to investigate the Old U.S. Mint.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghosts From Hale
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Coventry, Connecticut to investigate the Nathan Hale Homestead. Nathan Hale was an American Patriot who fought in the Revolutionary War and was executed by the Britishfor being a spy.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Something in the Water
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Excelsior Springs, Missouri to investigate The Elms Resort & Spa.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Irons in the Fire
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rocky Mountain Roundup
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR uses underwater drop cameras to find a missing jet skier in the Kootenay River.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In the southern interior of British Columbia, Penticton SAR lowers a stretcher team down a steep embankment to rescue an injured driver who was thrown from his car.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whiteout conditions critically delay Pemberton SAR’s search for a lost snowmobiler. And later, surviving an avalanche!

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue turns a missing out of bounds snowboarder into a crusader of mountain safety.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland and Nelson Search and Rescue risk avalanche threats to recover a ski fatality in the backcountry.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rings in the New Year with three back-to-back missions.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: White water rescue rookies in Nelson BC get a taste of reality when their swift-water training course becomes an actual mission, one they will never forget.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams go deep for a missing subject in the Upana cave system on Vancouver Island.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR rookie Sybilla Helms is put to the test with a real mission.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In southeastern British Columbia, Nelson Search and Rescue is rescuing an overly curious canine who’s tumbled off a cliff.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy About You
programme.desc: Mali is five years younger than his girlfriend Zay and they are total opposites. He still wants to party, and she is ready to settle down.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Like a Virgin
programme.desc: Emily is 29 and a virgin. The pressure from her boyfriend Romeo to have sex is overwhelming. Their 20 year age difference may be part of the problem because she chats it up more with strangers than him. Can Judge Toler help them find common ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: House Car
programme.desc: Latoya Ward and Davarius Greaves are back for round two! Latoya wants Davarius to become a stay at home dad because he can’t keep a job. Davarius says Latoya sabotages any work he can get and goes out of her way to create hostile environments.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Cheating Husband
programme.desc: Corey has cheated on his wife with 27 women and wants a divorce because he can't trust her. She cheated once and can't get over how she hid it from him. He also argues that his 27 times were purely physical, but hers was an emotional affair.

programme.title: Divorce Court: King of Kings
programme.desc: Joel claims he is a king looking for his queen. He says that him and Jerrica would succeed if she would just fall in line in his kingdom. Jerrica says she can no longer accept Joel’s list of rules and take his verbal abuse. She is ready to walk away.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Highway To Be Anger-Prone
programme.desc: Sonia and Lou find themselves in the middle of nowhere in a tooth-and-nail fight with a trio of nerdy stargazers, Froy and Sonia find a cooperative old man to be a hassle after agreeing to let him get his stuff out of his cluttered car, and Lou and Matt g

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt & Froy Auto Recovery
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia make their way to a home in the hills to clean a germaphobe of his car. Then, it's Matt and Froy's big repo. Having left the company to start their own, they head out after a high-end exotic car from outside a mansion.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: First, a mischievous magician gets Ronnie and Carlos to stick together when they interrupt his show to grab his car. Next, Froy and Ronnie have to put their hands on a seriously stupid sugar daddy and the recently upgraded debtor's chest.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Legal Repossession
programme.desc: First, Matt, Froy, and Lou do a legal repossession of an attorney's car. Next, Froy, Lyndah, and Sonia are speechless when they interrupt two girls in the back of a car. And finally, Lou and Sonia wrangle with a bunch of confused ATV owners blindsided by

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Blow to the Head
programme.desc: When Froy is seriously injured on a routine repo, the building confrontation between Lou and Matt continues to escalate.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Insignificant Anniversary Episode
programme.desc: Nick agrees to go to a Public Enemy concert on the same night as his \\"proposa-versary\\" with Suzanne, who is none too pleased.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Long Con Episode
programme.desc: Nick attempts to make a profit off an expensive set of African masks that Kevin bought at a yard sale, but instead, he becomes the victim of a larger scam.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Bigg Box Klub Episode
programme.desc: Nick goes crazy buying items in bulk that the family doesn't need at the The Big Box Club, discount super store.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Black Friday Episode
programme.desc: Comical chaos ensues when the gang waits in line to shop at a department store on Black Friday. Here, Kevin anticipates buying a new video game, Lindsey meets a boy, relationship problems plague Martin and Terrence hopes to buy toys for charity.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Blackout Episode
programme.desc: A guys' night out goes awry, resulting in lost recollections due to alcohol-fueled blackouts and the disappearance of Nick's wedding ring.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Wrong Way Episode

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the world’s most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mega Cities
programme.desc: Mega Cities provide a bustling home to populations of over 10 million. Travel from the high-density living of Shanghai and Bangkok to the sprawling cities of Delhi and Mexico City, each the backdrop for dynamic cultures.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Marine Animals
programme.desc: From the surprises of colorful reef characters to effervescent penguins, killer sharks, and regal whales, dive into the places where nature reveals itself in some of its most marvelous and bizarre forms.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Aims High/Flaw and Order
programme.desc: D.W. wants to be the first person to set foot on Mars! But what if scary purple aliens eat her? Who's responsible for cracking Dad's cake platter? DUN-DUN! All the evidence points to Arthur!

programme.title: Arthur: Around the World in 11 Minutes/Muffy and the Big Bad Blog
programme.desc: Pal, Baby Kate, Amigo, and Mei Lin enthusiastically accept Nemo's dare to travel around the world and make it back in 11 minutes. Then, Muffy discovers that web blogging is a great way to keep her readers up to date with her every move.

programme.title: Arthur: Carl's Concerto/Too Much of a Good Thing
programme.desc: Carl has agreed to play the accordion for George's puppet show. But his routines are getting in the way of rehearsals. Buster enlists Binky's help to keep him from gorging on delicious Tuvaluna cookies. Will Buster's self-control crumble?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Numbers Nightmare/Brain Gets Hooked
programme.desc: When the gang discovers a list of their class rankings in Principal Haney's office, they are all taken for a surprise. Brain gets hooked on the latest tween reality show and then starts to ignore his friends and his schoolwork.

programme.title: Arthur: The Great MacGrady, Parts 1 & 2
programme.desc: When Mrs. MacGrady is diagnosed with cancer, Arthur and his friends all react differently to the news. The kids must learn how to come together to help support each other and Mrs. MacGrady.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'S Imaginary Friend/Arthur's Lost Library Book
programme.desc: Someone only D.W. can see has moved in with the Reads. Her name is Nadine, and she follows D.W. everywhere. Arthur is the first to get the new Scare-Your-Pants-Off book from the library. Unfortunately, he can't figure out where he put it!

programme.title: Arthur: The Last Day (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: It's a time of change at Lakewood Elementary as Arthur and Buster move up to 4th grade. D.W. and Bud prepare to enter kindergarten and Muffy and Francine contemplate how spending the summer away from each other will affect their friendship.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Deer Friend/Buster Hits the Books
programme.desc: It’s time to celebrate summer! Join Arthur as he takes a family vacation and visits Grandpa Dave’s farm. Then, Arthur, D.W. and Buster spend a few days at the beach where they discover the simple joys of building sandcastles!

programme.title: Arthur: I'm A Poet/The Scare-Your-Pants-Off Club
programme.desc: Challenged by Fern to enter a poetry contest, Arthur and his friends each write a poem to be judged by the famous poet Jack Prelutsky. Then, Arthur and his friends develop a consuming passion for the Scare-Your-Pants-Off books.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Klaus Barbie
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters looks at how the husband and wife team of Serge and Beate Klarsfeld worked tirelessly to have Nazi war criminal Klaus Barbie extradited from Bolvia to stand trail in France.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Adolf Eichmann
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines the capture of Adolf Eichmann considered by many to be one of the main architects of the Holocaust. Eichmann was captured outside of his home near Buenos Aires in Argentina by Mossad agents.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Herbert Cukurs
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how Israeli secret service agents traveled to South America to assassinate Nazi war criminal Herbert Cukurs. Known as the Hangman of Riga, Cukurs was responsible for the deaths of over 30,000 Latvian Jews.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: Hitler's Killer Police
programme.desc: In Ukraine and Lithuania, Nazi invaders were welcomed as liberators. In Lithuania, Antanas Gecas led a militia that executed hundreds of Jews. Ukrainian nationalists participated in pogroms slaughtering 34,000 Jews in two days.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: The Good Collaborators?
programme.desc: Finland defended itself in the Winter War under Marshal Mannerheim. Finland allied with Nazi Germany against the Soviet Union in 1941. Finland later negotiated peace with the Allies and switched sides as Nazi defeat became apparent.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Joanna was about to meet her online love in the flesh, but a crazy night in Vegas caused the whole relationship to go sour. Now she's enlisted Nev to help track down her former flame. (S5, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jamey and Ari
programme.desc: Jamey fell for Ari online, and he will do anything to meet her, but she will only do it on TV! Nev and Max help Ari share her story, and she hopes Jamey will accept her as she is. (S4, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Aaliyah & Alicia
programme.desc: Aaliyah has been able to share her life struggles with Alicia. However, despite living only 70 blocks away, Alicia refuses to meet her as she hasn't come out to her friends and family yet.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Sunny & Jamison
programme.desc: Sunny is in love with the man of her dreams. Jamison is a model, a TV writer, and also studying to be an anaesthesiologist. However, the pair have never met. Is Jamison too good to be true? (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Joe & Kari Ann
programme.desc: Joe was sceptical when Miss Teen USA, Kari, sent him a friend request. Now, after months of communication, Joe thinks it might be the real deal, and he might have found love with her. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Jasmine writes to Nev and Max asking for help for a 'friend'. But they're perplexed when Jasmine drops a bombshell revelation: they've helped her friend before! Who is Jasmine's mysterious friend and how do Nev and Max know him?

programme.title: The City: Unexpected Roommates
programme.desc: Adam kicks Jay out of his apartment so Allie can move in &amp; Jay asks Whitney if he can live with her. Erin's plan to juggle two guys backfires &amp; leaves her alone on New Year's Eve. (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The City: The Past Catches Up
programme.desc: When the gang goes to Miami for the weekend, Jay runs into his ex-girlfriend Danielle and Whitney wonders if the rumours about them might be true after all. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Fool Me Twice, Shame On Me
programme.desc: Whitney's crushed to learn that Jay's mysterious night out was spent with his ex-girlfriend, Danielle. Olivia steals the credit from Whitney when they style an ELLE cover shoot! (S1, ep11)

programme.title: The City: I'm Sorry Whit
programme.desc: When Jay finds out he's going on tour, Whitney isn't willing to give up on the relationship, but when Jay doesn't give her a choice their relationship ends in a tearful goodbye. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: The City: Finale
programme.desc: Fresh from a breakup with Jay, Whitney questions if she made the right decision leaving LA. An opportunity opens up at work, but Olivia is after the same position. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: The City: Sleeping With The Frenemy
programme.desc: Olivia's working at ELLE Magazine, but meets her match in co-worker Erin Kaplan. Whitney returns to work for Kelly Cutrone, &amp; an old friend's in town, looking to crash with her. (S1, ep14)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: From the First Fist Pump
programme.desc: An entertaining look back at the first three seasons of Jersey Shore - complete with all the comedy, drama, mischievous antics, and water cooler moments that keep people talking.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Going to Italia
programme.desc: The housemates pack up their hair extensions & Shore Store t-shirts & jet off for an Italian adventure. But the culture-shock that awaits is nothing compared to their shocking new hook-ups. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Like More than a Friend
programme.desc: Deena & Pauly consider the consequences should they hook up. The Situation tries to take his friendship with Snooki to the next level. Ron & Sammi try to be friends but old habits die hard. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Killer Next Door

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Mortician, The Murder, The Movie

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: When a woman kidnaps another woman whom she suspects of having an affair with her husband, the SRU is called to the scene.

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: An old Willow tree has toppled over and needs to be chopped down. Lofty and Bob are going to make it safe and use the wood for other things. Meanwhile Travis and Sumsy wonder why they haven’t got a shelter of their own like Bob’s machines.

programme.title: Trains and Treehouses
programme.desc: Bob and his ‘Can-Do’ crew are back on site with a brand new adventure! Join Bob as he builds a train set for Mr Bentley as a birthday surprise and helps find a family of squirrels a new tree-house home.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a big day. The team are building Farmer Pickles new factory which will turn sunflowers into sunflower oil. Everyone is excited to meet Marjorie, who arrives by bicycle. Marjorie has been brought on board by Farmer Pickles to manage the factory.

programme.title: Green Builds and Recycling Centres
programme.desc: Bob’s back On Site! Join Bob as he shows you the amazing world of eco homes and recycling centres and learn how things you throw away can be used to make something new.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The Mayor decides that the town needs a drive-in cinema and Bob is asked to build it out in the countryside. The first film to be shown will be “The Invasion of the Giant Bug.”

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Its early morning and there’s a strange creature in Sunflower Valley. First of all it visits the Homestead and then Scarecrow Cottage scaring Sumsy and Travis. It’s something big and hairy, but gets frightened away by Scrambler carrying Baz.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are finishing refurbishing the old watermill ready to begin milling the first Sunflower Valley flour. Work is just about to start when Dizzy hears a squeaking noise coming from above. There are bats in the old mill!

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Wrongly Released

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Keith Blakelock
programme.desc: In 1985, PC Keith Blakelock was murdered during a riot on a housing estate in London, triggered after a black woman died of heart failure during a house search. Nobody has been brought to justice for his murder, despite three investigations.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Rose West
programme.desc: With her husband Fred, Rose West brutally murdered ten girls between 1973 and 1979, making her one of the most high profile serial killers in the UK.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Christopher Foster
programme.desc: Failed businessman Christopher Foster killed his wife and daughter before burning their mansion in Shropshire to the ground in August 2008.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Jimmy Savile
programme.desc: Jimmy Savile: From national treasure to one of the UK's most notorious sex offenders: this is the story of how the revelation of Jimmy Savile's crimes left the UK reeling.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Philpotts
programme.desc: When six children died in a house fire in Allenton, Derby in May 2012 it shocked the nation. Parents Mick and Mairead Philpott were charged with the murders. We uncover the reasons behind the arson attack on their own home.

programme.title: The Lost World: Heart of the Storm
